Life Insurance Coverage is available in this product. For more details on risk factors, associated terms and conditions and exclusions please read sales brochure carefully before concluding a sale. HDFC Life Click 2 Invest-ULIP (UIN: 101L100V01, Form No.: P501-127) is the name of the unit linked life insurance product. Unit Linked Life Insurance products are different from the traditional insurance products and are subject to the risk factors. The premium paid in Unit Linked Life Insurance policies are subject to investment risks associated with capital markets and the NAVs of the units may go up or down based on the performance of fund and factors influencing the capital market and the insured is responsible for his/her decisions. HDFC Standard Life Insurance Company Limited is only the name of the Insurance Company, HDFC Life is only the name of the brand and HDFC Life Click 2 Invest-ULIP (UIN: 101L100V01, Form No.: P501-127) is only the name of the unit linked life insurance contract. The name of the company, name of the brand and name of the contract does not in any way indicate the quality of the contract, its future prospects or returns. Please know the associated risks and the applicable charges, from your Insurance agent or the Intermediary or policy document of the insurer. The various funds offered under this contract are the names of the funds and do not in any way indicate the quality of these plans, their future prospects and returns. Hi There,
 
Are you planning to hire developers or designers anytime soon? Did you know that you could setup a virtual team of developers or designer for your business or agency at much lesser price? 

 

You may video interview a candidate before hiring him and feel confident about what you should expect. 

 

We will give you references of our existing clients on demand to make you completely satisfied before you work with us. 


About our company:
15+ years old Microsoft Gold certified IT company with 400+ global clients, 1000+ developed websites and 100+ dedicated developers supplied to SMBs, startups to enterprises in multiple domains

Our Clients:

We have more than 400+ global clients and have work with fortune 500 companies like Pepsico, Yahoo, Boston University and many more.

1. PHP Developers : Exp 1-8 years
2. .Net Developers : Exp 1-8 years
3. C#- Developers : Exp 1-8 years
4. SharePoint Developers : Exp 1-8 years
5. iOS- Developers : Exp 1-8 years
6.. Data Entry Executives
7. Android- Developers : Exp 1-8 years
8. Designers/UI Developers : Exp 1-8 years 

We can do a small trial for 1 month with weekly payment option to start with. You dont have to get into a long term commitment. 

I appreciate your time and will look forward to an opportunity to work with you.

Best Regards,
 
Ann Grant | Offshoring Coordinator
DOC Inc.
 
260, Maharani Bagh New Delhi 110014 IND
email: ann@globaldirectservices.com

New Google Analytics Add-On Displays Which Companies Are Visiting Your Website

Google Analytics ID: UA-55643415-1

New add-on for
Google Analytics

 
The New Google Analytics Add-On Displays Which Companies Are Visiting Your Website

New add-on for Google Analytics provides new detailed information about more than 180 million companies and the people behind.

The new add-on has become increasingly popular with Google Analytics users and provides thousands of new leads for businesses every hour. With the new add-on, you can quickly download the complete list of company's visitors directly to Excel or CSV file.

In addition to providing detailed company data, the add-on also provides contact information for specific company employees including email addresses and LinkedIn profiles.
